export var getMe=function getMe(token){return fetch('/api/users/me',{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var createUser=function createUser(userData){return fetch('/api/users',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(userData)});};export var loginUser=function loginUser(userData){return fetch('/api/users/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(userData)});};export var saveBrewery=function saveBrewery(breweryData,token){return fetch('/api/users',{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(breweryData)});};export var deleteBrewery=function deleteBrewery(breweryId,token){return fetch("/api/users/breweries/".concat(breweryId),{method:'DELETE',headers:{authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var searchBreweries=function searchBreweries(query){return fetch("https://api.openbrewerydb.org/breweries?by_city=".concat(query));// make a search to " xyz........"  api
};
